data.Sentence_cn: 星期三的晚上，我们去了市政厅。
data.Sentence: On Wednesday evening, we went to the Town Hall.

data.Sentence_cn: 那是一年的最后一天，一大群人聚集在市政厅的大钟下面。
data.Sentence: It was the last day of the year and a large crowd of people had gathered under the Town Hall clock.

data.Sentence_cn: 再过20分钟，大钟将敲响12下。
data.Sentence: It would strike twelve in twenty minutes' time.

data.Sentence_cn: 15分钟过去了，而就在11点55分时，大钟停了。
data.Sentence: Fifteen minutes passed and then, at five to twelve, the clock stopped.

data.Sentence_cn: 那根巨大的分针不动了。
data.Sentence: The big minute hand did not move.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们等啊等啊，可情况没有变化。
data.Sentence: We waited and waited, but nothing happened.

data.Sentence_cn: 突然有人喊道：“已经12点零2分了！那钟已经停了！”
data.Sentence: Suddenly someone shouted, 'It's two minutes past twelve! The clock has stopped!'

data.Sentence_cn: 我看了一下我的手表，果真如此。
data.Sentence: I looked at my watch.It was true.

data.Sentence_cn: 那座大钟不愿意迎接新年。
data.Sentence: The big clock refused to welcome the New Year.

data.Sentence_cn: 此时，大家已经笑了起来，同时唱起了歌。
data.Sentence: At that moment, everybody began to laugh and sing.
